website_summaries.verdict: A supplement to improve one's health in the long run.
pros: Customers love the added energy they feel
Pills are easy to swallow and don't have an aftertaste
We love that one pill includes both vitamins K2 and D3
The multi-vitamin supplement combines the effects of several vitamins to maximize health benefits
cons: Some customers may seek stronger results

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I have extremely low vitamin d levels. Straight vitamin d only constipated me. Very BADLY! I researched and learned, vitamin d REQUIRES k2 m7 in order to be moved into bones. It worked within 2 days. I was suffering with depression. I thought I would have to have knee replacement. The depression is gone. The pain in my joints is gone. Please, try them.
customer_reviews.author: A-SHOPAHPLIC😄

customer_reviews.title: Improved bone scan!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with osteoporosis last year in November. I was started on a prescription medicine and started myself on this K2D3 after reading about the positive effects of it on bone structure, along with the bioperine that is in this formula. I had another bone scan done this November, and my bone density had improved! I believe I can attribute it, at least in part, to this product. I will continue to take it and see what my next bone scan shows. Everyone needs to be taking this product to either help prevent bone loss or to help rebuild it. Thank you for making a great product available!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: When I went to the doctor for bloodwork last year, my Vitamin D was quite low (I believe in the 30s?) I ended up using a sub par product and then read about this one and why Vitamin K is important in conjunction with such higher levels of Vitamin D. After my last two rounds of bloodwork my levels came back in optimal range (50-65 ng/dL). This product has helped me get those levels, made me a feel healthier, and is set at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Berry

customer_reviews.title: good price. With two boys I always like to ...
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, good price. With two boys I always like to have supplements that help build immunity and my immunity has been awsome!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: with the entire Rami Nagel regimen it's working great! Love that they are affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for k2 & d3 at the recommendation of my son's biologic dentist for teeth remineralization. I put these in smoothies for him...with the entire Rami Nagel regimen it's working great! Love that they are affordable... 1/day I can actually afford to keep them on hand.

customer_reviews.title: vitamin k is also good for heart health
customer_reviews.text: works well. i have very low vitamin d and i need to take 5000 iu a day. grateful for combination supplements so i am not taking so many pills. i notice a big difference when i take it every day. vitamin k is also good for heart health, which i appreciate since i have a hole in my heart that concerns me.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I take it every day. I have MS and extra Vitamin D ist cruital. And K2 is just an extra benefit :)

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is powerful
customer_reviews.text: The only supplement I have ever taken that has produced a physical change. I bought this product to help remove and reverse plack out if my ateries. Only three weeks in, I noticed the HUGE calcium build up in my gumline also was normal. Today I can run my finger on my gumline and barely feel it. If it did that to my gums I can only imagine what other places it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huskin

customer_reviews.title: Learned K2 with D3 is Vital for plaque removal
customer_reviews.text: Using this product to help remove calcium from my arteries. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Starr

customer_reviews.title: Nails grow incredibly fast!
customer_reviews.text: An important and powerful combination supplement that in my experience will be the talk of future supplementation. As a man, I rarely think or spend any time on my nails, but have noticed my nail growth and thickness increasing in length and thickness rapidly. Why? Because the K2 is responsible for carrying calcium to the right places, teeth, bones, nails, etc. Amazing productx amazing results and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Who knew D3 was crucial to ones health!
customer_reviews.text: The best D3 on the planet! I can always notice if I forget to take my K2+D3. I usually take my supplements at bedtime. If I need extra energy I will take 2. I have Lupus and ALS, so I always need energy, but on the days that are going to be extra long & more taxing on my body it works out perfect for me! When I take 2, I wake up a few hours too early, so I have learned to take them around midnight. It's a natural energy and not the jitters.
customer_reviews.author: ny2azgirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent increase in vitamin D level
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent and affordable vitamin for 5000 UI of D3, plus K2 which is needed to be sure calcium goes to your bones and does not build up in the blood vessels. In my case I have always been in a low range for blood levels of vitamin D from upper teens to low 20’s. Now I test in the 30’s and hope I reach in the 40’s or higher at next test. Other health improvements include increased dental and gum health, no colds, a sense of well being and strength. I also take high levels of vitamin C and B3.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Holistic Success With Supplements
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old dog has been on NutriFlair Vitamin K2 for 60 days. It has helped in his recovery from Mast Cell cancer and we will continue using this product as research shows this type of supplement helps to mitigate new cancer growth. We have been amazed by his progress using a holistic approach to his treatment with our veterinary doctor's guidance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vegetarian Capsule
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the Vegetarian Capsule, the MK-7 ingredient, and because of where the BioPerine comes from, the Sabinsa Corporation, which are a class act company, and the price. I would like it better if it were Organic. But compared to other products, it was a great deal. Just starting taking it, so I will have to wait to make a comment on that.

customer_reviews.title: NutriFlair K2D3 5000iu
customer_reviews.text: One tablet for the 5000iu. Previously, I was taking two tablets to meet the 5000iu. I found this brand where I only need to take one tablet. Yippee!!!!

For instance, the bottle has a new level design, the bottle is bigger although contains the same 90 veggie capsules and the capsules itselfs are bigger and has a white color. Should I be concerned, the new capsules looks completely different from the previous ones.

customer_reviews.text: I take NutriFlair's K2+D3 in addition to calcium, magnesium and biotin for bone and heart health, as well as immune function and blood circulation. I am a breast cancer survivor and all of this is good for my body.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Plant based, Non GMO, vitamins D3 and K2 Mk7 in just the right ratio, 5000iu/100mcg, respectively.
customer_reviews.text: Plant based, Non GMO, vitamins D3 and K2 Mk7 in just the right ratio, 5000iu/100mcg, respectively. This is the ratio Dr. Jack Wolfson (Paleo Cardiologist) recommends. No stearates, Titanium Dioxide or other unnecessary ingredients. There is growing evidence among nutritional doctors (Dr. Berg, Wolfson et al.) that this combination will ensure calcium is deposited in bones and teeth and not arteries. The current thinking among these doctors is that the K2 with D3 will actually reverse calcium buildup (aka atherosclerosis) in arteries. This supplement forms a regular part of a healthy life style.
customer_reviews.author: URwhatUeat

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin D3-K2
customer_reviews.text: This D3 +K2 I purchased because of the price and had read up on what I believe to be this reputable company. I still think Nutriflair is a reputable company, and have been taking this Vitamin for about a month now. Havent had my numbers (blood test for deficiency) rechecked so I am not sure if it is. I will update this review when I get them rechecked, and I would buy this brand and even this vitamin again if so.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!

I would recommend these vitamins to my friends and family

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a vitamin D deficiency
customer_reviews.text: I take vitamin D to help with a seasonal deficiency. I've been taking this brand of supplement for a few months, and it seems to be working. My seasonal affective disorder is not hitting me as hard as usual, and my colds have not been as severe as other years when I wasn't taking supplements. I also like that this brand includes vitamin K2, which helps your body absorb the D.

Because I spent most of my days inside and working from home, I don't go out much, I use this combo every day.

customer_reviews.title: M.D.says K2 is Often Missed,  & Very Important
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my doctor. I normally take B12 tablets with vitaminD, And my doctor told me that I was missing the K2 element, but it was extremely important so I ordered this. Since I do have other supplements likely still in my system and I haven't been taking this very long, I can say that I like it, and I'm happy to be on board concerning taking K2. I have yet to experience any other type of benefits readily physically felt. But I'm happy to give another review in a couple of weeks.

customer_reviews.text: I find this to be a good combination of D3 and K2. However, the description said tiny easy to swallow capsule and I don't find that to be true. It's about the same size as my multi-vitamin which is definitely not tiny. I may end up switching to a liquid form in the future.

Some people consider this vegetarian, but i do not see it so I am a fan of these. They do not cause upset stomach and if you do not get a lot of sun, they are perfect for daily intake.

customer_reviews.text: I've been taking k2 d3 vitamins for a few months and can feel the difference with my teeth and overall health, great product and reasonably priced !!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Charron

customer_reviews.title: Bone Health
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because I know that it is healthy for my bones and my heart and living in Northern Wisconsin where I don't get lots of Vitamin D through sunlight it is essential.
customer_reviews.author: jstauff

customer_reviews.title: Great service.
customer_reviews.text: Great service and arrived as promised. They seem to do the trick!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product over 3 months now. Great buy at this price
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement for the immune system. Used it all last winter and never got a serious cold. Also, had my level checked by my physician and I'm in the ideal range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Bone health.
customer_reviews.text: I had a tooth filling fall out and was worried about my teeth. I was looking for something to strengthen my bones, including my teeth and found this vitamin to help balance my mood, keep my bones healthy, and regulate my immune function.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Decent product I see no complaints as of yet. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good for calcium
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tolerate dairy products,and have problems with calcium supplements. My doctor told me to take D3. This is been well tolerated with my touchy tummy. It also seems to help with those cravings between meals.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J.

product_meta.title: NutriFlair Plant Based K2 (Mk7) with D3 Vitamins with BioPerine, 90 Capsules
feature_bullets: ✔️ ALL-NATURAL plant-based, vegan-friendly Vitamin D3 + K2 capsules enhance skeletal strength and circulatory health. These fat soluble vitamins are also vital to healthy cell growth and tissue renewal.

✔️ INDUSTRY-LEADING 100mcg of Vitamin K2 per capsule supports strong bones, blood flow and immune system. This essential vitamin is critical for ushering calcium into bones and diverting it from soft tissues of the heart and arteries

✔️ VITAMIN D3 (5000 IU) facilitates normal immune system function, fortifying your resistance to illness and ridding your body of toxins. It also enhances mood and cognition, and acts as a natural appetite suppressant for weight loss.

✔️ ENHANCED ABSORPTION of vitamins and other nutrients with BioPerine. This Black Pepper Fruit Extract activates thermogenesis, the mechanism that promotes digestive processes and helps incorporate calcium into your bones.

✔️ STRICT GMP MANUFACTURING FACILITY AND PROCESSES guarantee product consistency through rigorous quality control processes. Pharmaceutical-grade manufacturing ensures the highest potency and efficacy per dose.
